venue.address_1: (behind Barnes and Noble) at DW Highway and Spit Brook Road
venue.name: Panera

item.description:
Here's the agenda:

7:00 - 7:15 organizer - relative to events/ongoing activity, recognition of efforts

7:15 - 7:40 Andy Demers (field director)

7:45 - 8:00 Brooke Moore - canvassing scheduling and technical

8:00 - 8:30 - open for 1. RP campaign issues 2. anything else
*** please email me if you want to get something on the agenda ***
richyankee@gmail.com

Please RSVP


With the new field director for our area, I think we should all get together, have a pow wow, and put together a plan going forward until the Primary. I would volunteer my house, but I down people want to drive to Lowell, so how about let's meet at Panera Bread in Nashua for dinner and a discussion. Please RSVP "yes" or "no" if you can or can't make it.
item.name: Nashua Meetup Planning Session
